author: SetTrend
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

The latest version of the PowerShell extension's integrated console comes with an Auto Completion feature:

![PS Auto Complete](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9283914/177522337-923df358-d9af-45ad-b7cc-b3b7bf3e441e.png)

I strongly feel distracted from this auto completion feature while I'm typing. Yet, I couldn't find a setting to disable the auto completion feature.

Please add a Boolean setting to disable the Auto Completion feature.
